greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest x such that remainder if x-th composite is divided by pi(x) equals n.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: Remainder=4 appears first as Mod[c[13],Pi[13]]=Mod[22,6]=4, so a(4)=13.
maple: for n from 6 while count < N do
if t > 0 and t <= N and V[t] = 0 then
